channel.title: Columbia River Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Columbia River Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-197 South/US-30 West at I-84 East
item.description: US-197 South/US-30 West at I-84/US-30 East to Arlington. Continue on US-197 South/US-30 West for Dufur and Bend.

item.title: US-197 South at I-84
item.description: US-197 south at I-84 West. Use I-84 west to Portland. Continue over freeway for I-84 east to Arlington. Continue south on US-197 for Bend.

item.title: US-197 North at I-84 East
item.description: US-197 North at I-84 East to The Dalles and Portland. Continue north on US-197 for Yakima (Washington).

item.title: US-197 North/US-30 East at I-84 East
item.description: US-197 North/US-30 East at I-84 East to Arlington. Continue north on US-197 for The Dalles Dam Visitor Facilities and Yakima (Washington). US-30 east joins I-84 eastbound to Pendleton.

item.title: US-197 North/US-30 East Approaching I-84
item.description: US-197 North/US-30 East approaching I-84 in The Dalles.

item.title: US-30 East - Webber St. at W 2nd St.
item.description: US-30 East - Webber St. at W 2nd St. Turn left for I-84 West to Portland; right for US-30 East to (The Dalles) City Center. Continue on Webber St. for Port Areas.

item.title: US-30 East at Webber St.
item.description: US-30 East (W 6th St.) at Webber St. in The Dalles. Turn left on Webber St. to continue east on US-30 for (The Dalles) City Center and Port Area. Also turn left for I-84 West to Portland.

item.title: US-30 East at I-84 East
item.description: US-30 East at I-84 East to Pendleton. Continue east on US-30 for Port Areas and City Center (The Dalles).

item.title: US-30 East - Port Areas
item.description: US-30 east at River Road to I-84 (Exit 82) and Port Areas. Continue east on US-30 for The Dalles.

item.title: I-84 Exit 69 Offramp at US-30
item.description: I-84 Exit 69 Offramp at US-30. Turn left to return to I-84 Westbound to Hood River; turn right for US-30/Moiser/Historic Columbia River Highway.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 301
item.description: I-5 South approaching Exit 301 - I-84/US-30 West/The Dalles. I-84 eastbound begins here, and ends in northeastern Utah. Continue on I-5 south for Salem.

item.title: US-97 South at I-84/US-30 East (Exit 104)
item.description: US-97 south at I-84/US-30 East (Exit 104) junction. Turn left on I-84/US-30 east for Rufus and Pendleton. Continue south on US-97 for Wasco and Bend.

item.title: US-97 South at I-84/US-30 West
item.description: US-97 north at I-84/US-30 West (Exit 104). Turn right for I-84/US-30 west to The Dalles and Portland. The Columbia River and the hills of Washington state are in the background of this photograph.

item.title: US-730 East - Sand Station Rec. Area
item.description: US-730 East at Sand Station Rec. Area on the Columbia River.

item.title: US-730 East - Distance Marker (Signed as OR-730)
item.description: Distance marker on US-730 east which is incorrectly signed as OR-730. Distance to Pasco (Washington) and Walla Walla (Washington).

item.title: US-730 East at OR-37
item.description: US-730 East at OR-37 South at Cold Springs Junction. Use OR-37 south for Holdman, Pendleton, and Warehouse Beach Recreation Area.

item.title: US-730 East Approaching OR-37
item.description: US-730 East approaching OR-37 at Cold Springs Junction.

item.title: US-730 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-730 east. Distance to Pasco (Washington) and Walla Walla (Washington).

item.title: End OR-207 North at US-730
item.description: End OR-207 North at US-730 in Umatilla County. Turn left for US-730 west to McNary Dam and Umatilla; turn right for US-730 east to Pasco (Washington) and Walla Walla (Washington).

item.title: End OR-207 North at US-730
item.description: End OR-207 North at US-730. Use OR-207 south for Hermiston and Heppner.

item.title: OR-207 North Approaching US-730
item.description: OR-207 North approaching US-730 in Umatilla County.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 137 Offramp at OR-19
item.description: I-84 East Exit 137 offramp at OR-19 in Arlington. Turn right on OR-19 south for Condon and John Day. Continue straight for access to I-84/US-30 East to Pendleton.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 137 Offramp at OR-19
item.description: I-84 West Exit 137 offramp at OR-19 in Arlington. Turn left on OR-19 south for Condon and John Day. Continue straight for access to I-84/US-30 West to The Dalles.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 137
item.description: I-84 West at Exit 137 - OR-19/Arlington/Condon.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 137
item.description: I-84 West approaching Exit 137 (OR-19 South). Use OR-19 south for John Day and Fossil. The Columbia River is in the background of the photograph, as well as the windmills that dot this area of the gorge.

item.title: I-82 East Exit 1 Offramp at US-395/US-730
item.description: I-82 East Exit 1 Offramp at US-395/US-730 in Umatilla. Turn left for US-730 East/US-395 South/McNary Dam/Hermiston.

item.title: OR-82 East at I-84 West (Exit 261)
item.description: OR-82 East at I-84 West (Exit 261) to Pendleton. Continue east on OR-82 for Elgin and Wallowa Lake.

item.title: 2nd St. North at I-84
item.description: 2nd St. North in Hood River at I-84 onramps. Use I-84 west for Portland; use I-84 east for The Dalles.

item.title: Rowena Access Road at I-84
item.description: Rowena Access Road at I-84 (Exit 76) onramp. Turn right for I-84 east to The Dalles. Turn left for I-84 west to Hood River, and to continue under freeway towards Mayer State Park.

item.title: W 2nd St. at US-30 and I-84
item.description: W 2nd St. in The Dalles at US-30 and I-84 east junction. Turn right for I-84 east, to Pendleton, and US-30 west. Continue ahead on 2nd St. for US-30 east. Turn left for the Port Area along the Columbia River.

item.title: US-97 North at I-84/US-30 West
item.description: US-97 north at I-84/US-30 West (Exit 104). Turn left for I-84/US-30 west to The Dalles. Continue north on US-97 towards Yakima (Washington). US-97 crosses over the Columbia River into Washington immediately north of this junction. The Columbia River and the hills of Washington state are in the background of this photograph.

item.title: US-97 North at I-84/US-30 (Exit 104)
item.description: US-97 north at I-84/US-30 (Exit 104) junction. Turn right on I-84/US-30 east for Rufus and Pendleton. Continue over freeway for I-84/US-30 west to The Dalles. The Columbia River, and bridge over the Columbia River into Washington is in the background of the photograph.

item.title: US-97 North at I-84 Frontage Road
item.description: I-84 north at I-84 Frontage Road, and approaching I-84/US-30 junction. Turn left on the Frontage Road for Deschutes State Park. Continue north on US-97 for I-84 junction, and Yakima (Washington). The Columbia River and Washington state are in the background of the photograph.

item.title: S. Main St. at I-84 East
item.description: S. Main St. at I-84/US-30 east. Turn left for I-84/US-30 to Pendleton.

item.title: OR-35 South/US-30 East at I-84
item.description: OR-35 South/US-30 East at I-84. Turn right for I-84/US-30 East to The Dalles. Continue ahead for OR-35 to White Salmon (Washington) via Toll Bridge and I-84 west to Portland.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 28
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 28 - Bridal Veil/Historic Columbia River Highway.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 25
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 25 - Rooster Rock State Park. Use Exit 25 for Rooster Rock State Recreation Area.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 22
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 22 - Corbett.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 18
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 18 - Lewis and Clark State Park/Oxbow Park. This bridge over the Sandy River on the approach to this interchange is under construction when this photograph was taken.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 17
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 17 - Marine Drive/257th Ave. Continue east on I-84/US-30 for The Dalles and Hood River.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 17
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 17 - Marine Drive/257th Ave.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 16
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 16 - 238th Drive/Wood Village.

item.title: I-84/US-30 East - Historic Columbia River Highway Diagram
item.description: Route diagram for the Historic Columbia River Highway on I-84/US-30 East. Use Exit 17 (last Portland Metro. Area exit) on I-84/US-30 East for the Historic Highway. The Historic Columbia River Highway and I-84/US-30 rejoin before Cascade Locks.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 14
item.description: I-84/US-30 east at Exit 14 - Fairview Parkway.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 13
item.description: I-84/US-30 East at Exit 13 - 181st Ave./Gresham.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 13
item.description: I-84/US-30 East approaching Exit 13 - 181st Ave.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 10
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 10 - 122nd Ave.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 22
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 22 - I-84/US-30 East/The Dalles. I-205 continues north to Portland Airport and Seattle.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 22
item.description: I-205 North at Exit 22 - I-84/US-30 East/The Dalles.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 21B
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 21B - I-84/US-30 West/Portland.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 21B
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 21B - Glisan St.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 19 and Next Exits
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 9 - US-26/Powell St./Division St. Use Exit 19 for Gresham and the DMV. Distance marker for two approaching Exits - Glisan St. (Exit 21A) and I-84/US-30 West/Portland (Exit 21B).

item.title: I-84 To I-5 Ramp at City Center IC
item.description: Ramp connecting I-84 west to I-5 south at City Center/OMSI exit. Continue south for I-5 south to Beaverton and Salem. OMSI stands for the Oregon Museum of Science and Industry.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 13
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 13 - 181st Ave./Airport Way.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 14
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 14 - Fairview Parkway.

item.title: 238th Ave. North at I-84
item.description: 238th Dr. North at I-84/US-30 onramp. Turn right for I-84/US-30 west to Portland. Continue across overpass for I-84/US-30 East to Troutdale and Hood River.

item.title: South 238th Drive at I-84
item.description: South 238th Drive at I-84. Use left lanes for I-84/US-30 West to Portland.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 16
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 16 - 238th Drive/Wood Village.

item.title: I-84 Frontage Road at 257th Ave. and I-84
item.description: I-84 Frontage Road East at 257th Ave. and I-84. Turn right for 257th Ave. and Mount Hood Community College. Continue straight for I-84/US-30 east onramp to The Dalles. Turn left for I-84/US-30 west to Portland.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 17
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 17 - Marine Drive/Troutdale. This is the first exit westbound in the Portland Metropolitan Area. Directly east of here is the Columbia River Gorge National Scenic Area.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 17
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 17 - Marine Drive/Troutdale. Entering Troutdale and crossing the Sandy River. The Sandy River is the boundary of the Columbia River Gorge National Scenic Area.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 18
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 18 - Lewis and Clark State Park/Oxbow Nature Park.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 22
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 22 - Corbett. The Columbia River is in the background of the photograph.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 25
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 25 - Rooster Rock State Park

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 29
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 29 - Dalton Point. Access to Dalton Point State Recreation Park, located on the Columbia River.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 168
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 168 - US-730/Irrigon. The internal Oregon State Highway 2 - The Columbia River Highway leaves I-84 here and joins US-730. I-84 continues east as Oregon State Highway 6 - The Old Oregon Trail Highway.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 165
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 165 - Port of Morrow

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 164
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 164 - Boardman

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 159
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 159 - Tower Road.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 151
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 151 - Threemile Canyon

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 147
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 147 - OR-74/Ione/Heppner.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 137
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 137 - OR-19/Arlington/Condon.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 131
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 131 - Woelpern Road. Exit 131 is an eastbound only exit, and only returns back to the freeway westbound.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 129
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 129 - Blalock Canyon.

item.title: I-84/US-30 - Philippi Canyon
item.description: I-84/US-30 at Exit 123 interchange. Turn right for Phillipi Canyon. The Columbia River is in the background.

item.title: I-84/US-30 Onramps at Exit 123
item.description: I-84/US-30 onramps at Exit 123 - Phillipi Canyon. Use I-84/US-30 west for The Dalles; I-84/US-30 east for Arlington.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 123
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 123 - Philippi Canyon.

item.title: I-84 East - Entering Gilliam County
item.description: Entering Gilliam County on I-84 west, crossing the John Day River.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 114
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 114 - LePage Park/John Day River.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 109
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 109 - Rufus/John Day Dam. John Day Dam is the third dam on the Columbia River from the Pacific Ocean.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 104
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 104 - US-97/Yakima/Bend. US-97 is the major north/south highway through Central Oregon, connecting Klamath Falls with Bend. US-97 crosses the Columbia River into Washington just north of here.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 97
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 97 - OR-206/Celilo Park/Deschutes State Park.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 88
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 88 - The Dalles Dam. The Dalles Dam is the second dam on the Columbia River from the Pacific Ocean.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 88
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 88 - The Dalles Dam.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 87
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 87 - US-197/Dufur/Bend. US-30 joins I-84 east to Pendleton.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 85
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 85 - City Center/The Dalles.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 84
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 84 - City Center/The Dalles/National Historic Districts.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 83
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 83 - West The Dalles.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 82
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 82 - Wasco County Museum/Columbia Gorge Discovery Center.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 76
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 76 - Rowena.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 69
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 69 - US-30/Mosier. US-30 leaves I-84 here, and parallels the south side of the highway to The Dalles.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 69
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 69 - US-30/Mosier. US-30 leaves I-84 here, and parallels the south side of the highway to The Dalles.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 64
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 64 - OR-35/Mt. Hood Highway/White Salmon/Government Camp. OR-35 crosses the Columbia River north of here, connecting to White Salmon, Washington. The next crossing of the Columbia River eastbound is in The Dalles. Westbound, the next crossing is at Cascade Locks.

item.title: 2nd St. North at I-84 West
item.description: 2nd St. North at I-84 West to Portland, at Exit 63 onramp.

item.title: 2nd St. North at I-84
item.description: 2nd St. North in Hood River at I-84onramps. Use I-84 west for Portland; use I-84 east for The Dalles.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 62
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 62 - US-30/West Hood River/Westcliff Drive. US-30 leaves I-84 here through the city of Hood River.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 58
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 58 - Mitchell Point Overlook.

item.description: I-84 east at Exit 56 - Viento State Park.

item.description: US-395 north approaching US-730 to Umatilla and Walla Walla.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 104 Offramp at US-97
item.description: I-84 west Exit 104 offramp at US-97. Use US-97 north for Yakima. Use US-97 south for Deschutes Park/Wasco/Bend.

item.title: End I-82 East at I-84
item.description: End I-82 east at I-84. Use I-84 west to Portland; I-84 east to Pendleton.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 1
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 1 - US-395/US-730/Umatilla/Hermiston. Continue east on I-82 for I-84/Portland/Pendleton.

item.title: End I-84 West at I-5
item.description: End I-84 West at I-5. Use I-5 north to Seattle; I-5 south to Salem.

item.title: I-84 West - Use I-5 North For US-30.
item.description: I-84 west approaching I-5. Use I-5 north to continue west on US-30.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching I-5
item.description: I-84 west approaching I-5 in Portland. Use right lanes for I-5 north to Seattle; left lanes for I-5 south to Salem. This is the western end of I-84.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching I-5
item.description: I-84 west approaching I-5. Use right lane for Convention Center/Rose Quarter via I-5 north. Use middle lane for Seattle and (Portland) City Center via I-5 north. Use left lane for Beaverton and Salem.

item.description: I-84 West approaching I-5 to Salem and Seattle.

item.description: I-84 west at Exit 9 - I-205/Salem/Seattle. Continue west on I-84/US-30 for Portland.

item.description: I-84/US-30 west approaching Exit 9 - I-205/Seattle/Salem. Continue west on I-84 for Portland.

item.title: US-197 South Approaching I-84
item.description: US-197 south to Bend at I-84 west to Portland, and approaching I-84 east to Arlington.

item.title: US-197 South Approaching I-84/US-30
item.description: US-197 south approaching I-84/US-30. This junction is immediately after the Columbia River bridge.

item.title: US-730 East at I-82 West/US-395 Jct.
item.description: US-730 east at I-82 West/US-395 Jct. Turn left for I-82 West/US-395 North to Kennewick (WA) and Spokane (WA).

item.title: I-82 West - Exit 1 Offramp at US-395/US-730
item.description: I-82 west Exit 1 offramp at US-395/US-730. Turn left for US-730 west to Umatilla City Center and Irrigon. Turn right for US-730 East/US-395 South to McNary Dam and Port of Umatilla.

item.title: I-82 West - Exit 1
item.description: I-82 west approaching Exit 1 - US-730/US-395 South/Umatilla/Irrigon.

item.description: End I-82 east at I-84 west to Portland; east to Pendleton.

item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 104, US-97/Yakima/Bend, 1 mile.

item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 123, Philippi Canyon, 1 mile.

item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 129, Blalock Canyon, 3/4 mile.

item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 164, Boardman.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 168
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 168, US-730/Irrigon. US-730 is a short route that follows the Columbia River from here to US-12 near Wallula Gap.

item.title: I-84/US-30 East - Distance Marker at Exit 123
item.description: Distance marker on I-84/US-30 east to Blalock Canyon and Pendleton.

item.title: I-84/US-30 West Onramp Exit 123
item.description: I-84/US-30 West freeway entrance to The Dalles, at Exit 123.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 21B
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 21B, I-84/US-30 West/Portland, 1/2 mile.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 22
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 22, I-84/US-30 East/The Dalles, 1 1/4 miles.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 22
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 22, I-84/US-30 East/The Dalles, and I-205 overhead to Portland Airport/Seattle.

item.title: US-730 East at OR-37
item.description: US-730 East at OR-37. Use OR-37 south for Holdman, Pendleton, and Warehouse Beach Recreation Area.

item.title: US-730 West - Speed 55
item.description: US-730 West - Speed 55 in Umatilla County. This is a standard type of speed limit sign in Oregon, especially on two lane highways. The idea is that only the world Speed (and not limit) invokes the Oregon Basic Speed Law instead of a hard and fast limit.

item.title: US-730 West - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on US-730 west at the Oregon-Washington state line. The Columbia River is to the right side of the photo.
